Q:'##class(Forum).NameExists( ..Forum, .forumId ) 0 s data("Forum") = forumId
s topic = $g(data("ExtId")), amount = $g(data("PagesAmount"))
s sc = ##class(Topic).Insert( .data ) #; any TopicsPage may have repeated first topic if 'sc && ( $system.Status.GetErrorCodes( sc ) = 5808 ) { Q 1 } Q:'sc sc
s topicId = $g(data) w topicId_" "
k data s data("pages") = amount s data("topic") = topic
